descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-5-1430438437.jpg[/img]

This mod adds some male followers. This is standalone.



[b][size=5][Follower detail][/size][/b]

[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-2-1430438360.jpg[/img]
Name: Lowell
Race: Nord
Level: 10 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager
Weight: 40
Location: Dragonsreach, Whiterun
Combat Style: One-handed warrior
Perks:
Light Foot, Agile Defender, Juggernaut, Tower of Strength
Armsman, Fighting Stance, Critical Charge, Savage Strike
Shield Wall, Deflect Arrows, Block Runner, Power Bash
Deadly Bash, Disarming Bash, Shield Charge
etc: Protected and marriable


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-3-1430438360.jpg[/img]
Name: Vanes
Race: Dark elf
Level: 15 - No limit
Voice: Dark Elf
Weight: 20
Location: Moorside Inn, Morthal
Combat Style: Archery
Perks:
Stealth, Muffled Movement, Light Foot, Silent Roll
Silence, Overdraw, Critical Shot, Ranger
Power Shot, Quick Shot, Agile Defender, Unhindered
etc: Protected and marriable


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-4-1430438360.jpg[/img]
Name: Perlman
Race: Redguard
Level: 20 - No limit
Voice: Brute
Weight: 100
Location: Silver-Blood Inn, Markarth
Combat Style: Two-handed
Perks:
Light Foot, Barbarian, Champion's Stance, Devastating Blow
Great Critical Charge, Sweep, Warmaster, Deep Wounds
Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher, Juggernaut, Fists of Steel
Tower of Strength, Agile Defender
etc: Protected and marriable


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-0-1431041818.jpg[/img]
Name: Zephyr
Race: Dark Elf
Level: 10 - No limit
Voice: Even Toned
Weight: 40
Location: Moorside Inn, Morthal
Combat Style: Archery+Summon Ravens
Perks:
Stealth, Light Foot, Overdraw, Summoner
MultipleSouls(Custom Perk)
etc: Protected and marriable


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-1-1431041818.jpg[/img]
Name: Godwin
Race: Orc
Level: 10 - No limit
Voice: Orc
Weight: 100
Location: Dead Man's Drink, Falkreath
Combat Style: Dual Wielding
Perks:
Novice Alteration, Apprentice Alteration, Adept Alteration, Expert Alteration
Armsman, Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery, Agile Defender
Juggernaut, Fists of Steel
etc: Protected


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-2-1431041818.jpg[/img]
Name: Lucas
Race: Khajiit
Level: 5 - No limit
Voice: Khajiit
Weight: 50
Location: Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood
Combat Style: Shock Magic
Perks:
Novice Destruction, Apprentice Destruction, Adept Destruction, Expert Destruction
Augmented Shock
etc: Protected and marriable


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65347-3-1431041818.jpg[/img]
Name: Alvin
Race: Breton
Level: 5 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager
Weight: 0
Location: Bee and Barb, Riften
Combat Style: Dual Wielding
Perks:
Stealth, Muffled Movement, Light Foot, Silent Roll
Silence, Armsman, Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery
Agile Defender
etc: Protected and marriable
